籤詩版本二:
Ina so in jawo Gui mara mutuwa a cikin fadar Toad, amma zan buɗe ƙofar sama in bar ku.
Nan da nan, labari ya yi dadi, kowa ya yi dariya ga furannin saman dutsen
詩意:
Wannan hexagram yana riƙe da alamar osmanthus mara mutuwa.
Dole ne a sami mutane masu daraja a cikin komai.
解曰: Sha'awar 'yan kasuwa. Akwai (ba) haɗari a cikin sanya shi. An warware rashin lafiya kuma an daidaita karar. Yi duk abin da za ku iya.
籤詩故事一:
◇Ka zama mai kirki da kulawa
Gao Huaide (926-982), mai suna Zangyong, an haife shi a Changshan, Zhending (yanzu Zhengding, Hebei).
A lokacin "Chenqiao Mutiny", saboda Gao Huaide ya goyi bayan Zhao Kuangyin a matsayin sarki, an ba shi mukamin mataimakin babban sufeto a gaban fadar.
Gao Huaide ya kuma auri 'yar'uwar Song Taizu Zhao Kuangyin (Zhao Kuangyin yana da 'yan'uwa mata biyu, daya ta rasu kuma ana kiranta da suna Gimbiya Chen bayan mutuwarta; ɗayan kuma ta auri Miford, amma abin takaici mijinta ya mutu kuma yanzu ta zama bazawara. Zhao Kuangyin mai suna. Ita ce babbar gimbiya Yan). . Sunan hukuma shine Prince Consort Duwei.
(Kasancewar jarumin da ya kafa kuma ya auri 'yar'uwar sarki, babu buƙatar damuwa game da rashin samun matsayi na hukuma.)
聖意: Gida baya cikin yanayi mai kyau, yana da kyau ga kai, yana da kyau ga kai, yana da kyau ga aure, yana da haɗari ga mutane silkworms , yana da illa ga dabbobi shida, yana da kyau a sami mutane, yana da wahala a sami mutane, yana da illa ga shari'ar jama'a, yana da illa ga ƙaura, yana da illa ga dukiyar da ya ɓace, yana da kyau ga cututtuka. Anshan da kaburbura sun tsufa da kyau.
古人: Ka kasance mai kirki da kulawa
